New Records: José Ramírez is on the verge of becoming the seventh member of the 40/40 club
Key Match Events: The game was delayed due to rain and eventually canceled
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Stephen Vogt mentioned that José Ramírez's 40/40 pursuit would be the storyline of the day
Vogt said that Ramírez has already accomplished the feat, but the lack of one final chance can't diminish what he's achieved
Post-Match Reflections: The game was canceled due to rain
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rainy conditions are expected to persist in northeast Ohio through 8 p.m.
The Guardians (92-69) are the American League Central Division champions and have locked up the No. 2 seed in the AL playoffs
Others: José Ramírez's season was reflected on, with several potential home run balls that he hit being mentioned as near misses
